"Shops":
"About Shops

At shops, you can buy and sell items. You can also buy back items that you sold by mistake.

You can purchase items from the Goods List, or sell items from your Inventory, by moving the cursor up and down, changing the number on the item with the left and right arrows, then selecting \"Buy\" or \"Sell\".
